description.translate: Like the molt of a life-filled mineral, this armor will provide unparalleled robustness to its wearer.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5Irrationnelle exuvie\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Telle la mue d'un minéral pourvu de vie, cette armure \"}","{\"text\":\"§7accordera une robustesse sans égal à son porteur.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Like the molt of a life-filled mineral, this armor\"}","{\"text\":\"§7will provide unparalleled robustness to its wearer.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7RES§a1 §7DAR§a1 §7SPD§c-2\"}"]}}
